title: 分糖果 II (Distribute Candies to People)
content: 思路: // @Title: 分糖果 II (Distribute Candies to People) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-06-03 11:49:53 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 40.2 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int[] distributeCandies(int candies, int num_people) { int start = 0; int[] result = new int[num_people]; int i = 0; while (candies > 0) { if (i == num_people) { i = 0; } if (candies > start) { result[i] += ++start; } else { result[i] += candies; break; } i++; candies = candies - start; } return result; } }
